property_widget.xienaoban.bole.bounding_:
Bounding box or hit box of the entity.
"Red" and "Blue" means the width of it, and "Green" means the height of it (unit: meter).
property_widget.xienaoban.bole.nether_po: Cooldown time of crossing a nether portal.
Button1: set the cooldown to infinity or zero.
property_widget.xienaoban.bole.custom_na: Custom name of the entity given by a name tag.
Button1: set whether the custom name is always displayed.
property_widget.xienaoban.bole.silent.de: Button1: set whether to keep the entity quiet.
property_widget.xienaoban.bole.health.de:
Each red bar represents up to 20 points.
A golden bar represents more than 20 points.
Max health is usually between 15 and 30.
property_widget.xienaoban.bole.leash: Whether the Entity Can Be Leashed
property_widget.xienaoban.bole.leash.des: Whether the entity can be leashed by a rope.
property_widget.xienaoban.bole.baby.desc: The growth stage of the baby entity.
Button1: set whether the baby will never grow up.
property_widget.xienaoban.bole.attractiv: When you hold these items, the entity will follow you.
property_widget.xienaoban.bole.breeding_: The food you can use to breed the entity.
property_widget.xienaoban.bole.eat_grass:
Force the sheep to eat grass under it.
Since you can force the sheep to eat wheat, of course you can also force it to eat grass (:P) ~
Button1: click to eat grass. You can't click it when there's no grass under the sheep.
property_widget.xienaoban.bole.horse_run:
Running speed is usually between 4.74m/s and 14.23m/s.
Jump height is usually between 1.09m and 5.29m.
property_widget.xienaoban.bole.merchant_: Interaction with the inventory will be supported in the future.
property_widget.xienaoban.bole.villager_: Shows the distance between the villager and the job site.
Button1: Highlight the job site for 6 seconds.
Button2: Force the villager to abandon the job site.
Button1: force the villager to restock (need to pay overtime).
text.hint.xienaoban.bole.not_baby: It's meaningless to lock the growth stage of adult creatures...
text.hint.xienaoban.bole.eating_grass: Wait two seconds. The sheep is eating grass!
text.hint.xienaoban.bole.far_from_grass: There is no grass under the sheep!
text.hint.xienaoban.bole.not_enough_item: You don't have enough items to purchase this service!
text.hint.xienaoban.bole.far_from_job_si: The villager is too far away from the job site!
